name: sample
description: - Meta Router for creating shell app that loads routed applications ("child apps") using iframes - iframes are created at runtime - Allows jumping to a specific route within child app - Synchronizing child app's routes with the shell's route - Resizes the iframes to prevent a scrollbar within the iframe - Written in VanillaJS to allow shell app to be as slim as possible - Tested with ``HashLocationStrategy`` - Tested w/ Chrome, Firefox, Edge and IE 11
